trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: ComponentChangingEventArgs provides data about a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: ComponentChangingEventArgs 提供有关数据<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event notifies the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> and registered event handlers that a particular component in the current design document is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>事件通知<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>并注册事件处理程序中当前的设计文档的特定组件即将更改。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event provides a widely accessible method to prevent a component from changing.
trans-unit.target: 此事件提供广泛可访问的方法来防止更改一个组件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event is raised before a component is changed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>组件发生更改之前，将引发事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity for a designer to abort the change.
trans-unit.target: 此事件提供为设计器能够中止更改的机会。

trans-unit.source: Component designers typically raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event automatically.
trans-unit.target: 组件设计器通常引发<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>事件自动。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: If a property cannot be changed, the method that handles the event can throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性不能更改，处理事件的方法可以引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a designer file is checked into source code control, the handler of this event typically throws an exception if the user refuses to check out the file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果设计器文件签入源代码管理，此事件的处理程序通常会引发异常如果用户拒绝签出该文件。

trans-unit.source: A ComponentChangingEventArgs provides the following information: - A `Component` property that indicates the component that is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: ComponentChangingEventArgs 提供以下信息:-`Component`指示将要修改的组件的属性。

trans-unit.source: - A `Member` property that indicates the member that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: -A`Member`属性，指示将要更改的成员。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs> indicates the component and member that are about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs>指示将要更改的组件和成员。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The component that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 将要更改的组件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> indicating the member of the component that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> ，该值指示是将被更改组件的成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that is about to be changed or the component that is the parent container of the member that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取将要更改的组件或组件将被更改的成员的父容器。

trans-unit.source: The component that is about to have a member changed.
trans-unit.target: 将要进行更改的成员的组件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the member that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取将要更改的成员。

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if the member is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是`null`如果该成员是未知。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> indicating the member that is about to be changed, if known, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> ，该值指示是将被更改，如果已知，成员或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>否则为。
